SEARCH
Package de.fherfurt.clevercash.api.service

Klasse SavingService

java.lang.Object
de.fherfurt.clevercash.api.service.SavingService
@Service public class SavingService extends Object
Service for managing savings associated with bank accounts. Provides functionalities to create, update, find, and process savings.
Autor:
Jakob Roch, Richard Prax, Anton Götz

  • Methodendetails

    • createOrUpdateSaving

      public Saving createOrUpdateSaving(Saving saving)
      Creates or updates a saving.
      Parameter:
      saving - the saving to create or update
      Gibt zurück:
      the created or updated saving

    • findAllSavingForUserWithFilters

      public List<Saving> findAllSavingForUserWithFilters(int userID, int bankAccountID, String startDateString, String endDateString, String description) throws DateTimeParseException, NoSuchElementException
      Finds all savings for a user with optional filters.
      Parameter:
      userID - the user ID
      bankAccountID - the bank account ID
      startDateString - the start date filter (optional)
      endDateString - the end date filter (optional)
      description - the description filter (optional)
      Gibt zurück:
      the list of filtered savings
      Löst aus:
      DateTimeParseException - if date parsing fails
      NoSuchElementException - if bank account is not found

    • findSavingByID

      public Saving findSavingByID(int userID, int bankAccountID, int savingID) throws NoSuchElementException
      Finds a saving by its ID.
      Parameter:
      userID - the user ID
      bankAccountID - the bank account ID
      savingID - the saving ID
      Gibt zurück:
      the found saving
      Löst aus:
      NoSuchElementException - if saving is not found

    • removeSavingFromBankAccount

      public void removeSavingFromBankAccount(int userID, int bankAccountID, int savingID) throws NoSuchElementException
      Removes a saving from a bank account.
      Parameter:
      userID - the user ID
      bankAccountID - the bank account ID
      savingID - the saving ID
      Löst aus:
      NoSuchElementException - if saving or bank account is not found

    • findActiveSaving

      public Saving findActiveSaving(int userID, int bankAccountID) throws NoSuchElementException
      Finds the active saving for a bank account.
      Parameter:
      userID - the user ID
      bankAccountID - the bank account ID
      Gibt zurück:
      the active saving
      Löst aus:
      NoSuchElementException - if no active saving is found

    • addSavingToBankAccount

      public Saving addSavingToBankAccount(int userID, int bankAccountID, NewSavingDTO newSavingDTO) throws IllegalArgumentException, NoSuchElementException, AlreadyExistsException
      Adds a saving to a bank account.
      Parameter:
      userID - the user ID
      bankAccountID - the bank account ID
      newSavingDTO - the new saving data transfer object
      Gibt zurück:
      the added saving
      Löst aus:
      IllegalArgumentException - if saving validation fails
      NoSuchElementException - if bank account is not found
      AlreadyExistsException - if an active saving already exists

    • removeActiveSaving

      public boolean removeActiveSaving(int userID, int bankAccountID) throws NoSuchElementException
      Removes the active saving from a bank account.
      Parameter:
      userID - the user ID
      bankAccountID - the bank account ID
      Gibt zurück:
      true if an active saving was removed, false otherwise
      Löst aus:
      NoSuchElementException - if no active saving is found

    • transferFromSavingToBalance

      public BankAccount transferFromSavingToBalance(int userID, int bankAccountID, int amountInt) throws NoSuchElementException, IllegalArgumentException
      Transfers an amount from savings to balance.
      Parameter:
      userID - the user ID
      bankAccountID - the bank account ID
      amountInt - the amount to transfer
      Gibt zurück:
      the updated bank account
      Löst aus:
      NoSuchElementException - if bank account is not found
      IllegalArgumentException - if there are not enough savings

    • processSaving

      public void processSaving(Saving saving)
      Processes a saving by creating a transaction and updating the saving and bank account.
      Parameter:
      saving - the saving to process
